key_risk_themes: ["Security Vulnerabilities in Critical Authentication Paths","Complexity of Asynchronous & Distributed Systems (SAGA/Jobs)","Infrastructure Dependencies and Bottlenecks (CI/CD, Redis)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize and de-risk CI/CD pipeline setup (RISK-004) to unblock team velocity.","Mandate stringent security code reviews and third-party testing for all authentication and session management features (RISK-002).","Develop and test a robust failure recovery plan for the account deletion SAGA before deployment (RISK-001)."]
